description.fr: Vaincre tous les Cochons. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {value:bou}\_{#CANNONBALL, value:bou} tombent sur des cases aléatoires.
description.en: Defeat all the Pigs. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {value:bou}\_{#CANNONBALL, value:bou} fall on random cells.
description.es: Vencer a todos los cerdos. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {value:bou}\_{#CANNONBALL, value:bou} {bou, plural, one[cae] other[caen]} en casillas aleatorias.
description.de: Besiege alle Schweinemonster. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {value:bou}\_{#CANNONBALL, value:bou} fallen auf zufällige Felder.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Porcos. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {value:bou}\_{#CANNONBALL, value:bou} caem sobre células aleatórias.
